property.caption: static
property.description: The coordinates could be entered manually or from datasource

property.caption: Name of Region Attribute
property.description: Provide name of context object attribute whose value has to be replaced by the name of the clicked region e.g. 'NameOfAttribute'

property.caption: Name of Region color
property.description: Provide name of context object attribute whose value has to be replaced by the color of the clicked region e.g. 'NameOfAttribute'

property.caption: Input parameter entity
property.description: Entity of the parameter passed to the microflow or nanoflow

property.caption: Locations entity
property.description: Entity of the list returned in data source microfow or nanoflow. This entity must have at least three String attributes named as follows: "_RegionName", "_RegionCoordinate", "_RegionColor"

property.caption: Microflow
property.description: The datasource 'Microflow' that returns the list of locations

property.caption: Nanoflow
property.description: The datasource 'Nanoflow' that returns the list of locations

property.caption: image to show
property.description: Image of the map. This should be the image that was used to generate the polygon points

property.caption: image width
property.description: The width should be same as the height of the map image

property.caption: image height
property.description: The height should be same as the height of the map image

property.caption: Unselected region color
property.description: Color of a map polygon when unselected. It should be in RGB e.g. rgb(255, 255, 255, 0)

property.caption: Selected region color
property.description: Color of a map polygon when unselected. It should be in RGB e.g. rgb(255, 255, 255, 0)
